document_data.name: Where the Maiden Dances
document_data.mainbody: '''Where the Maiden Dances''' was a lovely inn found in the village of [[Uluvin]].
document_data.Services: The inn offered cozy, thoughtfully-decorated rooms that were kept very tidy. The staff was well-mannered and quite attentive.
document_data.Rumors & Legends:
The ''Maiden Dances'' was so named for the spectral [[elf]] woman who periodically appeared within the inn. While it was a beautiful sight it only appeared to those that were considerably inebriated.

The inn was actually constructed over the location where the elf-maiden was buried.
